headline: Signals
intro: Three quick looks at reproducible tech wins.

cards.title: Tuning models boosts accuracy 15%
cards.problem: Baseline models plateaued at 70% F1 on noisy data.
cards.approach: Iterative hyperparameter search with cross-validation avoided overfitting.
cards.evidence: Benchmarks on three datasets lifted F1 to 80% Â±0.5 in reproducible tests.

cards.title: Prewarming slashes load times
cards.problem: Cold starts slowed API responses to 900 ms under load.
cards.approach: Introduced staged cache warming and connection pooling on deploy.
cards.evidence: Synthetic traffic showed median latency drop to 250 ms.

cards.title: Simulated stress tests flag weak spots
cards.problem: Unclear how system handled burst traffic and partial failures.
cards.approach: Ran distributed chaos simulations modeling node loss and spikes.
cards.evidence: Results mapped threshold where error rate exceeds 2%.
